# Heartbeat - Uptime Monitoring Service

**Name:** Heartbeat
**Website:** https://heartbeat.cool
**Company:** Misty Step (https://mistystep.io)

## What is Heartbeat?

Heartbeat is a "set and forget" uptime monitoring service. Create monitors for URLs that are automatically checked on configurable intervals, from 1 minute to 1 hour. The system detects outages using a three-strike confirmation (3 consecutive failures trigger an incident), maintains incident history, and provides real-time visibility through beautiful status pages.

## Key Features

- **Interval Options:** 1min, 2min, 5min, 10min, 30min, 1hr
- **Incident Detection:** 3 consecutive failures = incident open
- **Real-time Alerts:** Email and webhook notifications
- **Status Pages:** 7 themes available (Glass, Ukiyo, Memphis, Blueprint, Swiss, Broadsheet, Mission Control)
- **Response Time Tracking:** Monitor latency and detect performance degradation
- **14-day Free Trial:** All plans include full access
